path.style: stroke-width: 100; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(10, 10, 10); fill: none;
stroke-width: 25; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(138, 138, 138); fill: none;
stroke-width: 25; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill: none;
